title: Head Girls Cross Country Coach (no teaching assignment)
description: This Head Girls Cross Country coaching assignment is for the 2025-2026 school year with no expectation of a teaching assignment.WCSD coaches are required to meet all UHSAA certification requirementspriorto starting assignment and are required to maintain certifications during duration of employment.If any additional questions, applicants can contact the Athletic Director, Gabi Hasenbeck,  at gabi.hasenbeck@washk12.org.A stipend will be provided for this assignment.
